name: FSX Steam Edition: Beechcraft® Baron® B55 Add-On
detailed_description:
The Military Visualizations B55 combines a highly detailed, carefully crafted model with high quality texturing both inside and out to recreate the experience of being in the pilot’s seat. Smoothly modelled 3d gauges convey a wealth of information and feedback to the pilot, with even the little features present in the form of a working legacy Stormscope radar gauge.

Meanwhile, the refined flight model is designed to replicate the crisp and stable flying characteristics of the B55, ensuring the ability to handle the aircraft in close response to real world pilot reports. Performance figures closely follow the actual charts available for the B55, and as a bonus, a replication of the flying characteristics of the more powerful E55 is available as well.

Features:


  • Carefully tested flight dynamics
  • Six HD liveries included
  • Detailed start-up and shutdowns
  • Detailed systems and avionics
  • Realistic lighting and custom effects
  • High quality external and internal models
  • Functioning Stormscope weather radar
  • Highly detailed product operating handbook included

short_description: The Military Visualizations B55 combines a highly detailed, carefully crafted model with high quality texturing both inside and out to recreate the experience of being in the pilot’s seat.

fullgame.name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features

legal_notice: Beechcraft® Baron® B55 is a trademark of Textron Aviation Inc. and is used under license to RailSimulator.com Ltd d/b/a Dovetail Games.
